turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I'm looking for a gift for my dad. He's really into grilling, so I guess something related to that. What grilling accessories would you recommend?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! Based on the 'grilling accessories' category, I recommend the following top-rated items: a premium BBQ grill brush and scraper, a digital meat thermometer with instant read, and a set of stainless steel grilling tools.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, he already has a decent set of grilling tools. Is there anything else? Something a little more unique or unexpected, maybe?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, expanding slightly within the grilling category, here are a couple of more unique items: a Himalayan salt block for grilling, which imparts a subtle salty flavor, and a smoker box attachment for adding wood smoke flavor to his grilling. Would either of those interest you?
